name: victuals
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
food and drink: "I can't bear to see good victuals wasted," said Martha. Thank you for these fine victuals, my good man. They sat outside in the sunshine and enjoyed their vittles.
More examplesFewer examplesI cooked up some victuals for them to take on their journey.Keeping an army well supplied with victuals is essential if you want to win a war.The table was heaving with mouth-watering Christmas victuals.I prepared some vittles for them as well as the coffee.
